plot outline: The story revolves around thirteen people living in Delhii Heights-an apartment in New Delhi, India. There's Suhana and Abi, newlyweds who work for rival companies. Next comes a lively and joyful Sikh named Timmy Kohli, his wife Ruby, and his two daughters. Then there's flirtatious Bobby and his wife Saima. Also, there's Lucky, a funny cricket bookie with quite a personality. And finally, there are four boys living in Delhii Heights, who are always chasing girls and pulling pranks on each other. How these residents' lives play out and intertwine are the highlights of the film.
title: Delhii Heights
